definition: the act of throwing the ball to another member of your team, agitate
details:
noun
- the act of throwing the ball to another member of your team
= example: the act of throwing the ball to another member of your team
= synonyms: pass
- an abrupt movement
= example: an abrupt movement
- the act of flipping a coin
= synonyms: flip
verb
- agitate
= example: agitate
- throw or toss with a light motion
= synonyms: flip, pitch, sky
- throw carelessly
= synonyms: chuck
- move or stir about violently
= synonyms: slash, thrash, convulse, thresh, thresh about, thrash about, jactitate
- lightly throw to see which side comes up
= synonyms: flip
- throw or cast away
= synonyms: discard
